page.title: 06SPORT WASHINGTON/FELLING
page.content: Sport is an important recreation for many people in this area. {Swimming, {football}and other{sports}are held in schools, clubs and community centres. The{swimming baths}at Leam Lane, Felling are well attended: the pool is of olympic standard, as it is 50 metres long and there are courses for{diving,}including{sub-aqua training. {Running}is a particualy popular interest.An event which many enjoy, as competitors or spectators, is the annual{Washington Fun Run organised by{Usworth School. }The course is six miles long. There were approximately 1380 competitors in the Fun Run this year which was an increase on previous years. Runners are sponsored to raise money for charity and many competitors go on to enter the Great North Run, which is well known nationally.
